sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **2022-10-03** 

Véase Entorno de escritorio para leer el artículo principal.

Véase también Wikipedia:Comparison of X Window System desktop environments.

Table content:
Entorno de escritorio | Widget toolkit | Gestor de ventanas | Barra de tareas | Emulador de terminal | Gestor de archivos | Calculadora | Editor de texto | Visor de imágenes | Reproductor multimedia | Visor de documentos | Navegador web | Gestor de pantalla
Budgie | gtk3 | budgie-desktop | budgie-desktop | gnome-terminal | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm
Cinnamon | gtk3 | muffin | cinnamon | gnome-terminal | nemo | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | Firefox | lightdm-gtk-greeter
Deepin | gtk2 gtk3 qt5-base | deepin-wm[enlace roto: package not found] | deepin-shell | deepin-terminal | deepin-file-manager | deepin-calculator | deepin-editor | deepin-image-viewer | deepin-movie | evince | Chromium | deepin-session-ui
EDE | fltk | pekwm | edeAUR | xterm | pcmanfm | zalcAUR | fltk-editorAUR | edeAUR | flmusicAUR | flaxpdf-gitAUR[enlace roto: package not found] | dillo | xorg-xdm
Enlightenment | efl | enlightenment | enlightenment | terminology | enlightenment | equate | ecrire-gitAUR | ephoto-gitAUR | rage | eevee | links | xorg-xdm
GNOME | gtk3 | mutter | gnome-shell | gnome-terminal | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm
GNOME Flashback | gtk3 | metacity | gnome-panel | gnome-terminal | nautilus | gnome-calculator | gedit | eog | totem | evince | epiphany | gdm
KDE Plasma | qt5-base | kwin | plasma-desktop | konsole | dolphin | kcalc | kate (también proporciona kwrite) | gwenview | dragon | okular | falkon or konqueror | sddm
Liri | qt5-base | greenislandAUR | liri-shell-gitAUR | liri-terminalAUR | liri-filesAUR | liri-calculatorAUR | liri-textAUR | eyesightAUR[enlace roto: package not found] | liri-player | qpdfviewAUR | liri-browser-gitAUR | sddm
LXDE GTK 2 | gtk2 | Openbox | lxpanel | lxterminal-gtk2AUR | pcmanfm | galculator-gtk2AUR[enlace roto: package not found] | leafpad | gpicview | lxmusic | atril-gtk2AUR[enlace roto: package not found] | midoriAUR | lxdm
LXDE GTK 3 | gtk3 | Openbox | lxpanel-gtk3 | lxterminal | pcmanfm-gtk3 | galculator | l3afpad | gpicview | lxmusic | atril | midoriAUR | lxdm-gtk3
LXQt | qt5-base | Openbox | lxqt-panel | qterminal | pcmanfm-qt | speedcrunch | featherpad | lximage-qt | smplayer | qpdfviewAUR | falkon | sddm
MATE | gtk3 | marco | mate-panel | mate-terminal | caja | mate-calc | pluma | eom | parole | atril | midoriAUR | lightdm-gtk-greeter
Pantheon | gtk3 | gala | plank wingpanel | pantheon-terminal | pantheon-files | pantheon-calculator | pantheon-code | pantheon-photos | pantheon-videos | evince | epiphany | lightdm-pantheon-greeter
Sugar | gtk3 | metacity | sugar | sugar-activity-terminal | sugar | sugar-activity-calculate | sugar-activity-write | sugar-activity-imageviewer | sugar-activity-jukebox | sugar-activity-read | sugar-activity-browse | lightdm-gtk-greeter
Trinity | TQt | TWin | Kicker | Konsole | Konqueror | KCalc | Kwrite Kate | Kuickshow | Kaffeine | KPDF | Konqueror | TDM
Xfce | gtk3 | xfwm4 | xfce4-panel | xfce4-terminal | thunar | galculator | mousepad | ristretto | parole | atril | midoriAUR | lightdm-gtk-greeter
